title: Cumberland Island National Seashore: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Our Cumberland Island lesson plans have been aligned with the Georgia Performance Standards. Most of the lessons can be adapted for a variety of grade levels and subject areas. Activities for both classroom and park settings have been included. Please free to customize them to best meet the needs of your students. All Curriculum Materials   Lesson Plans    Dungeness Scavenger Hunt Learn More     Field Trips Planning a field trip to Cumberland Island? Information for requesting entrance fee waivers, making ferry reservations and requesting ranger led activities, can be found here.  All Field Trips   Plan a Field Trip    Nature Observation Walks Learn More
